positions.name: .Net Developer
Responsibilities: Web application development
WebApi development
Work with PM and SA to discuss system process
Requirements: Familiar with C#.NET and ASP.NET
Familiar Microsoft SQL Server
Familiar ADO.NET, Entity Framework, LINQ
Able to do modular programing and timeframe evaluation
Able to write test case

positions.name: Android Developer
Responsibilities: Familiar with Android SDK, Java
Experience with mobile application development
Ability to plan the entire system structure independently and efficiently
Experience and familiarity with mobile UI
Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
Expertise in analyzing and optimizing the performance and efficiency
Familiar with Git
Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services
Requirements: Build and test applications for the Android platform
Prepare development documents
Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
Rapidly fix bugs and solve problems

positions.name: iOS Developer
Responsibilities: Knowledge of Objective-C or swift with cocoa framework
Experience with mobile application development
Ability to plan the entire system structure independently and efficiently
Experience and familiarity with mobile UI
Ability to discover, evaluate, research and implement new technologies and latest iOS programming techniques to maximize the product quality and efficiency
Expertise in analyzing and optimizing the performance and efficiency
Familiar with Git
Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
Requirements: Build and test applications for the iOS platform
Prepare development documents
Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
Rapidly fix bugs and solve problems

positions.name: UI Designer
Responsibilities: Be able to help clients to solve the business problems through transforming user insights to visual design
Staying up to date with latest design and technology trends
Communicate effectively in a cross-functional product development team and present ideas and designs effectively
Be able to quickly iterate and take on multiple projects in the same time
Oversee the development and delivery of effective user interfaces across a range of client websites and mobile apps
Work with the UX Design team to ensure all client sites and apps deliver the best experience possible
Requirements: Experience with entire product development process, from insight, design and hangover to development
Familiarity in designing across multiple devices from mobile, tablet, and desktop
Familiarity in the latest iOS and Android design guidelines
Strong skill on designing in system and nested symbol in Sketch
Excellent problem solving skills
Excellent interpersonal skills and great sense of humour
Self-motivated to prfioritize and manage workload and meet critical project milestones and deadlines

positions.name: Android Developer
Responsibilities: 熟悉 Android SDK、Java
需具備手機app開發經驗
能夠獨立規劃程式架構
熟悉並具備UI開發經驗
具備第三方套件及Api經驗
能夠分析與最佳化產品表現和效能為佳
熟悉Git版本控制
熟悉串接RESTful API
Requirements: 將最新產品技術於Android系統上開發並建置
準備開發文件
與團隊合作定義、設計發佈新功能
確保應用程式的性能質量和影響性
幫助維護程式碼質量並且組織自動化
快速修復bug和解決問題

positions.name: iOS Developer
Responsibilities: 熟悉Objective-C 或是swift
需具備手機app開發經驗
能夠獨立規劃程式架構
熟悉並具備UI開發經驗
具備尋找並開發最新iOS技術以強化產品品質和效能的能力為佳
能夠分析與最佳化產品表現和效能為佳
熟悉Git版本控制
熟悉串接RESTful API
Requirements: 將最新產品技術於iOS系統上開發並建置
準備開發文件

幫助維護程式碼質量並且組織自動化
快速修復bug和解決問題
